dnxhd, dnxhd_mxf: dnxhd, copy
mov_prores: prores, copy
Note: With 'copy' video codec video will be repacked to the new format without transcoding. All video settings would be ignored

closed_caption.description:
no  no closed caption
timed-text  Closed Captions would be muxed in video as 3GPP Timed Text track
cea-608  Closed Captions would be muxed in video as cea-608 track
cea-708  608 closed captions would be up-converted to 708 closed captions. And both, cea-608 and cea-708 closed captions, would be muxed in video stream

loud_norm.description: Audio loud normalization according to EBU standard R128. Does not apply to passthrough audio.

delayAdjustment.description: Specifies the data delay in millisecond in order to synchronize with the video stream, range -1250ms to 15000ms, default 0. Applicable to each mode.

mode.description: e_PASSTHROUGH (default) or e_GENERATE. When e_GENERATE is selected, the input PTS is discarded, and the output PTS is automatically generated.

id.description: Unique identifier of a input in UUID format

inputDeliveryStatus.description: List of delivery status at input

resetDateStatistic.description: last reset date of the counters  (SMPTE 2022-1 FEC or SRT), null if not used

status.description: The status of the input of the source

frameRateRange.description: Filtering frame rate - min and max

horizontalResolutionRange.description: Filtering horizontal resolution - min and max

verticalResolutionRange.description: Filtering vertical resolution - min and max

incrementValue.description: The value that the port or multicast IP address increase by.

asserts.description: List of asserts used to match this messages, in XPath format

match.description: Determines how the match the asserts for this trigger (ALL, ANY, NONE)

accessKey.description: Access key for S3 bucket authorization

secretKey.description: Secret key for S3 bucket authorization

aacHeader.description: By default, aacHeader of the profile is used, or ADTS if aacHeader is not defined in the profile

ac4IframeInterval.description: Range 12..1000 when video frame-rate is 25 or 50 fps, range=14..1000 when video frame-rate is 29.97 or 59.94 fps. By default, ac4IframeInterval of the profile is used

bitrate.description: Audio bitrate in kbps. Valid values are dependent on the codec, number of channels and sample rate. By default, bitrate of the profile is used.

channels.description: Valid values are Pass-through, Stereo (all codecs), Mono (all codecs except AAC-HEv2), 5.1 (AAC-LC, HE-AACv1, AC-3, EAC-3, AC-4), 5.1.4 (EAC-3, AC-4). By default, channels of the profile is used

gain.description: Static gain applied to the audio, in dB. Range -20..20. By default, gain of the profile is used.

languageIndex.description: Applicable when profile is in match-by-language mode. This index will be used to match the language configured in the profile. The audioProperties will apply for the profile's audio track for the matching language index.

sampleRate.description: Audio sampling in kHz. Valid values are 16 (AAC-LC mono/stereo), 32 (AAC, MP1L2), 44 (AAC mono), 48 (all). By default, sampleRate of the profile is used.

sourceLabel.description: Applicable when the profile is in match-by-label mode. This label will be used to match the label configured in the profile. The audioProperties will apply for the profile's audio track for the matching label.

targetlevel.description: Applicable when HALC is used (i.e. audioLevelAlgorithm is e_HALC in the profile), or when target level mode is used (i.e. audioLevelAlgorithm is e_StaticGain and targetLevel is not e_None in the profile). In dBFS when audioLevelAlgorithm is e_StaticGain or when alcMode is e_A_WEIGHTING, in LKFS when alcMode is e_ATSC_A85 or e_EBU_R128. e_None, e_m15, e_m16 are not valid values. By default, targetlevel of the profile is used.

maxNumInstances.description: Maximum number of instances to launch, unset numOfInstances field before using

minNumInstances.description: Minimum number of instances to launch, unset numOfInstances field before using

responseTimeThresholdForFullScaleUp.description: Target response time for scaling to max number of instances when exceeded

scaleDownPolicy.description: The policy to control the speed of scaling down.

scaleDownStabilizationWindowSeconds.description: Duration of the time window that the autoscaler uses to calculate the high-water-mark of replicas, such that it never scales below the marking

scaleUpOnly.description: Whether or not auto-scaling is limited to scale-up only

targetCpuPercent.description: Target CPU utilization percentage for calculating desired number of instances

targetRequestRate.description: Target request rate for scaling the number of instances linearly

ackPacketCount.description: Number of sent ACK packets, cumulated since last statistics reset

belatedPacketCount.description: Number of received and ignored packets due to having come too late, cumulated since last statistics reset

connectionAge.description: Time since the SRT connection is started, in milliseconds, reinitialized at each reconnection, frozen if connection is lost

nackPacketCount.description: Number of sent NACK packets, cumulated since last statistics reset

receivedPacketTotal.description: Number of received packets, cumulated since last statistics reset

recoveredPacketTotal.description: Number of recovered packets, cumulated since last statistics reset

retransPacketCount.description: Number of retransmitted packets received, cumulated since last statistics reset

srtReconnectionCount.description: Number of SRT reconnections, cumulated since last statistics reset

unrecoveredPacketTotal.description: Number of unrecovered packets, cumulated since last statistics reset

coolDownPeriodSec.description: The cool-down period after scale-up / scale-down where no further scaling will take place

scaleDownStepPercentage.description: Percentage of number of existing nodes to remove during scale-down

scaleUpStepPercentage.description: Percentage of number of existing nodes to add during scale-up

authorized_grant_types.description: Grant types ( by default: AUTHORIZATION_CODE, REFRESH_TOKEN )

firstEventRank.description: The position of the first returned event in the playlist. The current on-air event has firstEventRank = 1

logoState.description: Logo status of the logo with corresponding uuid

uuid.description: uuid of the logo to be inserted

outputFollowInputPid.description: Default to false where the output PID will follow the PID in source configuration or the PID in the labwizard encoding profile if it is defined. When set to true, the output PID will follow the PID in the input stream (ignoring the PID specified in source configuration and labwizard encoding profile). This parameter is ignored (same as false) when serviceTrackingMode is OFF.

pidOffset.description: Default to 0 and ignored if outputFollowInputPid = false. pidOffset will be applied to the output PID so output PID = input PID + pidOffset when outputFollowInputPid = true. A modulo is applied if input PID + pidOffset is outside the range of 32 to 8175 so if input PID = 8174 and pidOffset = 2, the output PID will be 33.

adaptationSetIdPattern.description: The pattern for generating the AdaptationSet ID in MPD document.The following patterns are supported:%mediaType - stream media type, %index - numbers in order

altWatermarkOutputPrefix.description: Alternative watermark output prefix, which will be added to the beginning of all playlist, manifest and segment name.

availabilityTimeOffset.description:
The availability time offset property (expressed in milliseconds) for chunked CMAF low-latency mode.
Will be calculated automatically if -1 is set.

chunkDurationInMillisecond.description: The duration of the CMAF chunk in milliseconds.

cmafEncryptionMethod.description: Specify which encryption method should be used when integrate with DRM.

customGroupingProfileId.description: Specify the HLS Audio Grouping Profile to customize the HLS playlist audio and video grouping.

dashCcHandling.description: Enable CC subtitle conversion for DASH

dashInsertAudioRole.description: Include the AudioRole tag to the audio Adaption Set. Used only if mediaPresentationProfile is e_ISO_LIVE

dashInsertCustomStreamName.description: Insert custom name as label in CMAF-DASH manifest.

dashKeyRotationSignalling.description:
Configuration of DASH key rotation signalling:
 - MANIFEST_BASED_SINGLE_PERIOD (Manifest-based, Single Period) 
- IN_BAND (Segment-based, Single Period)
Default: MANIFEST_BASED_SINGLE_PERIOD

dashTeletextHandling.description: Enable Teletext subtitle conversion for DASH

dashUsePtsAsPto.description: Use PTS as PTO in DASH manifest

decodeTimeShiftToPlayTime.description: Enable to shift decoding timeline to match the presentation timeline, resulting in same first DTS and PTS for each segment, as well as potential negative CTO in segment

displayHResolutionRounding.description: The function that will be used to round the display horizontal resolution.

displayHdcpLevelAttribute.description: Specify whether to show HDCP-LEVEL attribute for each stream on HLS master playlist.

dvrWindowSize.description: Control of the availability of media segment files most recently added to the Media Presentation Description (MPD) file (expressed in seconds).

enableChunkedCMAF.description: Enable chunked CMAF to support low latency OTT delivery

enableCountryCode.description: Use ISO Country Code in language identification

enableExtXGapTag.description: Enable the insertion of HLS GAP tag in the playlist during periods of content loss. This helps indicate missing content segments in the HLS stream.

enablePackageBasedKeyRotation.description: Override the DRM global setting and enable customized per Package output key rotation setting

encryptSEI.description: Enable SEI encryption for HLS fmp4 package output, if value is false, encryption of SEI entry will be skipped

hlsCcHandling.description: Enable CC subtitle conversion for HLs

hlsInsertCustomStreamName.description: Insert custom name as NAME attribute in CMAF-HLS manifest.

hlsTeletextHandling.description: Enable Teletext subtitle conversion for HLS

indexFileNameForIFrameOnlyStreamForFlatt.description:
An index file is an ordered list of media URLs and informational tags. Each media URL refers to a media file which is a segment of a I-Frame Only stream. This setting specifies the file name of the index file for each variant stream excluding file extension (i.e. .m3u8).

Supported escape pattern:
%streamid Stream ID

Sample configuration: %streamid
Resultant file name: 01.m3u8

indexFileNameForMediaStreamForFlattenedM.description:
An index file is an ordered list of media URLs and informational tags. Each media URL refers to a media file which is a segment of a single contiguous stream. This setting specifies the file name of the index file for each variant stream excluding file extension (i.e. .m3u8).

Supported escape pattern:
%streamid Stream ID
%streamid:streamIdFormat=%0{number}llu Stream ID in some format, for example %01llu. %02llu is the default.

Sample configuration: %streamid
Resultant file name: 01.m3u8
Sample configuration: %streamid:streamIdFormat=%01llu
Resultant file name: 1.m3u8

insertAdaptationSetId.description: Include the Id attribute to the AdaptionSet element in MPD document

insertAudioChannels.description: Specify whether the CHANNEL value must be inserted in master playlist for each audio track.

insertDefaultKIDToManifest.description: Insert default Key ID to CMAF-DASH manifest. Default value is true.

insertParAndSarAttributesInMpd.description: Include AdaptationSet@par and Representation@sar attributes in DASH manifest.

keepOverlayPlcmtOppInClear.description: Keep Overlay Placement Opportunity in Clear

keyChangePeriod.description: The key change period for key rotation (expressed in seconds).

latencyMax.description: Service Description: the service providers indication about the maximum presentation latency in milliseconds.

latencyMin.description: Service Description:: the service providers indication about the minimum presentation latency in milliseconds.

latencyTarget.description: Service Description: the service providers preferred presentation latency in milliseconds compared to the producer reference time.

minBufferTimeInMs.description: The minimum buffer time of dash manifest.

minimumUpdatePeriod.description: The minimum update period of dash manifest.

mpdAccessibilityComplianceMode.description: Change the Accessibility tag compliance in the Media Presentation Description (MPD). Used to switch to DASH-IF compliance mode

mpdFileName.description: The name of Media Presentation Description (MPD) file which is used to describe a Media Presentation.

numberBasedSegments.description: Enable number based segment instead of time based segments

passThroughParameterSets.description: Pass-through Parameter Sets. Video parameter sets can be stored in sample entry only (sample entry name is 'hvc1' for HEVC or 'avc1' for AVC) or video parameter sets can be stored in sample entry and samples (sample entry name is 'hev1' for HEVC or 'avc3' for AVC).

playbackRateMax.description: Service Description:: the maximum playback rate that the content provider indicates is appropriate for the purposes of automatically adjusting playback latency and buffer occupancy during normal playback, where 1.0 is normal playback speed.

playbackRateMin.description: Service Description:: the minimum playback rate that the content provider indicates is appropriate for the purposes of automatically adjusting playback latency and buffer occupancy during normal playback, where 1.0 is normal playback speed.

scte35AnnotationTag.description: Control the tag for annotating SCTE35 message on HLS playlist

scte35CreateNewPeriodForNbcOverlayPlacem.description: Creation of a new period for Overlay Placement SCTE-35 messages in NBC mode.

scte35DaterangeTagsInMs.description: Use milliseconds for SCTE-35 EXT-X-DATERANGE tag

scte35DefaultAutoReturnDuration.description: SCTE-35 Default Auto-return Duration, for segmentation mode e_NBC only.

scte35RetainProgramChapterStart.description: Retain program/chapter start SCTE-35 messages in NBC mode

segmentLengthInMillisecond.description: The duration of the media segment files (in seconds).

segmentRetentionPeriod.description: The duration that the media segment files actually retain in the publishing server (expressed in minutes).

segmentTemplateType.description: The type of segment template for constructing segment URL. 'TIME_BASED' means time-based segment template; 'NUMBER_BASED' means number-based segment template. Default is 'TIME_BASED'

serviceDescription.description: Add Service Description in manifest. It allows to sync all the players (supporting low-latency) to a similar latency, based on the PRFT value.

startingLivePoint.description: Starting live point in seconds. A positive number indicates a time offset from the beginning of the Playlist. A negative number indicates a negative time offset from the end of the last Media Segment in the Playlist.

suggestedPresentationDelayMillisecond.description:
The suggested presentation delay is to let the player to play behind the live point (expressed in milliseconds) to encounter buffer issues.
Optimal value will be used if -1 is set.
Default value is -1.

targetDuration.description: Set the target duration in playlist (in seconds). 0 means follow segment duration

ttmlTemplate.description: The TTML template. String in XML that allows to control how output TTML looks like.

urlOrderOfVariantPlaylist.description: Specify how the playlist URLs are arranged in the variant playlist.

useUnifiedSegmenter.description: Use UnifiedSegmenter for new CMAF live data-path

utcTimingSchemeIdUri.description: UTCTiming element SchemeIdUri, this element will be added in Dash manifest to help synchronize Dash client with the server

utcTimingValue.description: UTCTiming element Value, available if UtcTimingSchemeIdUri is not 'None'

variantPlaylistFileName.description: The variant playlist lists the URLs of each variant stream to allow clients to switch between encodings dynamically. This setting specifies the file name of the variant playlist excluding file extension (i.e. .m3u8). For example, if this value is set to 'master' (excluding ''), the actual file name will be 'master.m3u8'.

teletextInputSelection.description: Configure Teletext Input Selection, e.g. DVB or VBI or any

teletextOutputFormat.description: Configure the output format of Teletext, e.g. none or follow the input

croppingSettings.description: Specifies the region of the video to crop

hasAmolLine.description: Specifies the removal of AMOL or WSS line from the source video

insertNullPidOnSignalLoss.description: Indicate insertion of nulls when there is video signal loss

labels.description: Labels identifier of the video stream

tracks.description: Additonal list of essential metadata of video

videoNoiseReduction.description: Specifies noise reduction and artifact repair option reqiured

videoStreamType.description: Type of the video stream; Stream Type defined at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Program-specific_information#Elementary_stream_types

extXVersionTagValue.description:
EXT-X-VERSION tag value: 
	-1: default, will set automatic 
	0: do not insert EXT-X-VERSION tag to the playlist 
	2 and more - version number

assetId.description: Identifier for the asset to be played; a live source name, filename for file assets (the uri of the asset in asset library, with or without file path and extension), or asset title for recorded assets

assetTitle.description: Text or additional information about the asset, usually the material title

audioProfileName.description: The grooming profile to be used for file assets, to allow the audio tracks of the file to be selected. Grooming profiles are defined in the Asset Acquisition application. Not applicable to live events and recorded assets

description.description: Descriptive text that may contain additional information about the event

endMode.description: Specifies how the event will end (Duration or Manual)

eventType.description: Event type, File (including recorded file) or Live

materialType.description: Material type of the asset. Special values Program, Avail, and Commercial are used for SCTE-35 generation

scte35WindowEnd.description: End time of the SCTE-35 validity window (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ), in UTC. This event and following events in the same ad pod (material type is COMMERCIAL or AVAIL, and start mode is FOLLOW) are skipped if we don't receive SCTE-35 trigger with splice-time before this time, or if we don't receive SCTE-35 trigger x seconds before this time (x is 2 seconds if the event after the ad-pod is a prepared live source, otherwise it can be up to 32 seconds). Used only when the startMode is EXTERNAL

scte35WindowStart.description: Start time of the SCTE-35 validity window (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ), in UTC. Any SCTE-35 trigger with a splice-time before this time is ignored. Used only when the startMode is EXTERNAL

som.description: Indicates the position in the asset to start playback (hh:mm:ss.sss). When the SomType is RELATIVE, the SOM value is the offset from the start of asset. When the SomType is ABSOLUTE, it is the timecode value for the starting position in the asset. An empty or blank value is treated as zero offset

somType.description: The type of SOM, which determines how the SOM value is used. When the SomType is RELATIVE, the SOM value is the offset from the start of asset. When the SomType is ABSOLUTE, the Som value is the timecode value for the starting position in the asset

startMode.description: Specifies how the event will start (Fixed Time, Follow, Manual Take, or External SCTE-35 trigger)

startTime.description: Event start date/time in UTC (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ). The start time will be automatically calculated for all events except those with Fixed start mode

tcDuration.description: Equivalent to duration, but in timecode format (hh:mm:ss[:;]ff)

tcErrorDuration.description: Equivalent to errorDuration, but in timecode format (hh:mm:ss[:;]ff)

tcScte35WindowEnd.description: Equivalent to scte35WindowEnd, but in timecode format (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss[:;]ff)

tcScte35WindowStart.description: Equivalent to scte35WindowStart, but in timecode format (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss[:;]ff)

tcSom.description: Equivalent to som, but in timecode format (hh:mm:ss[:;]ff)

tcStartTime.description: Equivalent to startTime, but in timecode format (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss[:;]ff)

upid.description: The uPid value is inserted in the segmentation_upid field of the segmentation descriptor in generated SCTE-35 messages. SCTE-35 messages are generated for events with material type PROGRAM, AVAIL, or COMMERCIAL. It is a hexadecimal string, e.g. "0x000000002C11422B" with or without the leading "0x"

upidType.description: The uPid type is inserted in the segmentation_upid_type field of the segmentation descriptor in generated SCTE-35 messages. SCTE-35 messages are generated for events with material type PROGRAM, AVAIL, or COMMERCIAL

automaticGrooming.description: Enable automatic grooming. Might not be supported by all input types.

grooming.description: Essential metadata for the system to intelligently route the input

hspEndpoint.description: (Deprecated)Internal Live ingest endpoint of the source

hspEndpointId.description: (Deprecated)Live ingest endpoint Id of the source

ipPort.description: TCP port to receive RTMP input (range:20300-20399)

pcrConstraints.description: Customize the PCR constraints for TS inputs (like IP/SRT/CLOUD). Once set, the system will use customized constraints to check the PCR values and end-to-end latency could be increased.

programNum.description: Program number of the input stream. Only required in MPTS input.

publicRtmpEndpoint.description: (Deprecated)Public Live ingest endpoint of the source

rtmpMode.description: "IP" mode for XOS RTMP input transcoding

sporadicVideoFrames.description: Specify that sporadic video frames input. Video frames can come in bursts or at random intervals. Typical use case is music streams with still video content.

authorizedDpiTiers.description: List of authorized/allowed dpi tiers. Incoming SCTE35 section will not be discarded if it contains one of these tiers. Range: 0-4094

blockScte35InputMessages.description: if set to true, discard all SCTE35 messages, regardless of tier value, except 0xFFF (4095)

ipAddress.description: IP address used to receive the input. IPv4 and IPv6 are supported

ipPort.description: UDP port used to receive the input

ipPortRangeEnd.description: UDP port range end used to receive input

uplinkGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the uplink Group

firstAudioTargetLevel.description: Target intermediate loudness for the first mixing audio

secondAudioTargetLevel.description: Target intermediate loudness for the second mixing audio

key.description: match key of the manipulation profile

hexaValue.description: the buffer content of the descriptor in hexa value

enable.description: Enable publishing decryption key to external server

keyUriPath.description: Key Retrieval URI Path if useSpecifiedKeyUriPath is set to true

password.description: Password for connecting to external server using basic authentication

username.description: Username for connecting to external server using basic authentication

inputObjectId.description: The serviceId of the service for a transcoded service, sourceId for a passthrough service or the id of a primary program for a virtual program

inputProgramNumber.description: Input Program number for a pass through service, MUST be null for a transcoded service and a virtual program

inputPidConfigured.description: Input PID configured at service creation

pullBitrate.description: The pull bitrate (bps) of origin engine

groomingProfileIds.description: List of grooming profiles to apply to assets

transcodingProfiles.description: List of transcoding profiles to apply to assets

token.description: Token of log aggregation system endpoint

url.description: URL of log aggregation system endpoint

user.description: User of log aggregation system endpoint

emptyDataUnitHoldBackInMs.description: Determines how far away from latest PCR will packager generate internal empty data units up to, 0 for automatic.

broadcastCBRProfileProperties.description: not yet defined, will have a strong-typed profile

customerVersion.description: The Customer Version of the profile

harmonicVersion.description: The Harmonic Version of the profile

hlsGroupingProfileProperties.description: Properties of HLS audio grouping profile

id.description: identifier of profile

inputStreamSelectionProfileProperties.description: Properties of Input Stream Selection profile

isCustomized.description: If it is a customer created profile, it can be deleted in RT.

isReadonly.description: If it is a readonly profile, no property can be modified

isTemplate.description: If it is a template, it will not be allowed to be deleted, modified

labels.description: Labels are used to specify identifying metadata

lastUpdatedTime.description: last update time of the profile

masterId.description: The Master Id of the profile

mmsTranscodeRequirements.description: Optional field for defining the computing resource requirement on each transcode node. (only used for MMS)

ottStbProfileProperties.description: Properties of ott set top box profile

processingRequirementProperties.description: Optional field on defining the computing resource requirement on processing this profile. (only used for Transcoding profile)

pureOttPlayoutDestinationProfileProperti.description: Properties of Pure OTT Playout destination profile

pureOttPlayoutProfileProperties.description: Properties of Pure OTT Playout profile

stbProfileProperties.description: Properties of set top box profile

validateTime.description: The Validate Time of the profile

version.description: The minimal required VOS bundle version to use this profile

forceContentLength_HLS_SS_DASH.description: Force Content-Length in HTTP response, i.e. deactivate Chunked Transfer Encoding

maxNumOfIndexFileCacheEntry.description: Determine the cache limit for MDS to cache index files

ccToDvbSubtitleConversionProperties.description: properties related to CC to DVB subtitle conversion

dvbSubtitleToDvbSubtitleConversionProper.description: properties related to DVB subtitle to DVB subtitle conversion

outputBasePid.description: (Deprecrated) Output base PID of the data

outputPid.description: Output PID, normal range is 32..8190. If -1 is set, source grooming value (as set during discover process) will be used, or 582 (or higher) if not defined in source grooming (non-TS source for example). Any other value is not recommended and will behave as -1 in current version.

outputPipPid.description: PIP Output PID of the data

scte27ToDvbSubtitleConversionProperties.description: properties related to SCTE27 to DVB subtitle conversion

sourceLabel.description: (Deprecrated) Label of the source stream to be processed

sourceLabels.description: List of label of the source stream to be processed

teletextToDvbSubtitleConversionPropertie.description: properties related to teletext to DVB subtitle conversion

id.description: ID of channel

timeshiftBuffer.description: Status of the circular buffer for timeshift playback

lostPackets.description: Number of lost RTP packets (based on RTP sequence number)

dvrWindowSize.description: Control the availability of thumbnail segment files most recently added to the thumbnail index file (in seconds).

imageSpriteInColumn.description: The image sprite per column for POTF.

imageSpriteInRow.description: The image sprite per row for POTF.

segmentRetentionPeriod.description: The duration that the thumbnail segment files actually retain in the publishing server (in minutes).

thumbnailInterval.description: The thumbnail fragment duration (expressed in milliseconds).

boxNumber.description: The number of the template box to be written

value.description: The text to be written to the template box

languageCodes.description: Filtering subtitle with language codes, case intensive, match by same character number

originOutputEndPoints.description: List of end point mapped to packaging profile type

dailySyncTime.description: Daily sync time (UTC) for the timecode synchronization. Applicable mainly for 29.97/59.94 fps. Range 0..23, default is 0

id.description: Trigger id for this trigger configuration

matchAny.description: List of trigger properties for this trigger configuration

name.description: Trigger name for this trigger configuration

dolbyEProgramConfig.description: Number of programs at Dolby E audio stream

drmKeyUriParametersPattern.description:
DRM Key URI parameters pattern: Possible values: 
%r 
%t 
%p 
Empty by default. 
Example: '%r%t%p'

bitstreamMode.description: Audio Service Type within the Bit Stream

dcHighpassFilter.description: DC high pass filter. If not specified, it means auto

dialogueNormalization.description: Dialogue normalization. If not specified, it means auto. it should be negative

digitalDeEmphasis.description: Digital de-emphasis. If not specified, it means auto

dolbySurroundExMode.description: Dolby Surround EX mode. If not specified, it means auto

dolbySurroundMode.description: Dolby Surround mode. If not specified, it means auto

fallbackBitstreamMode.description: Fallback Audio Service Type within the Bit Stream

fallbackDialogueNormalization.description: Fallback Dialogue normalization. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackLineModeDrc.description: Fallback Line mode DRC. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackLoRoCenterMixLevel.description: Fallback Lo/Ro Center mix level. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackLoRoSurroundMixLevel.description: Fallback Lo/Ro surround mix level. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackLtRtCenterMixLevel.description: Fallback Lt/Rt Center mix level. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackLtRtSurroundMixLevel.description: Fallback Lt/Rt surround mix level. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackPhaseShift.description: Fallback 90-degree phase shift. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackRfModeDrc.description: Fallback RF mode DRC. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackStereoDownmixPreference.description: Fallback Stereo downmix preference. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

fallbackSurroundAttenuation.description: Fallback 3 dB attenuation. If not specified, device default value will be used as fallback

heightTrim.description: heightTrim is E-AC3 metadata in the E-AC3 stream. This metadata supports -3db to -12db in 3db steps. Default: -3db.

lfeChannel.description: Specify whether to enable Lfe channel

lfeLowPassFilter.description: Lfe low pass filter. If not specified, it means auto

lineModeDrc.description: Line mode DRC. If not specified, it means auto

loRoCenterMixLevel.description: Lo/Ro Center mix level. If not specified, it means auto

loRoSurroundMixLevel.description: Lo/Ro surround mix level. If not specified, it means auto

ltRtCenterMixLevel.description: Lt/Rt Center mix level. If not specified, it means auto

ltRtSurroundMixLevel.description: Lt/Rt surround mix level. If not specified, it means auto

objectBasedAudio.description: Flag for deciding when channel mode is Passthrough, whether E-AC3 output should support 5.1.4 or not, i.e. whether to enable DDP-JOC encoder.  Default: false

phaseShift.description: 90-degree phase shift. If not specified, it means auto

rfModeDrc.description: RF mode DRC. If not specified, it means auto

stereoDownmixPreference.description: Stereo downmix preference. If not specified, it means auto

surroundAttenuation.description: 3 dB attenuation. If not specified, it means auto

surroundTrim.description: surroundTrim is E-AC3 metadata in the E-AC3 stream. This metadata supports 0db to -9db in 3db steps. Default: -3db

dvrWindowSize.description: Control the availability of media segment files most recently added to the index file (in seconds).

scte35Signaling.description: The way of handling SCTE35 messages. 'NONE' means ignoring the messages; 'BASE64' means writing the SCTE35 data to playlist in base64 format.; 'STANDARD' means writing the SCTE35 data to playlist in SCTE35 Standard format; 'GOOGLE DOUBLE CLICK' means writing the SCTE35 data to playlist in Google Double Click format; 'UK 1 means writing the SCTE35 data to playlist in UK 1 format; Default is 'NONE'

variantPlaylistFileName.description: The variant playlist lists the URLs of each variant stream to allow clients to switch between encodings dynamically. This setting specifies the file name of the variant playlist excluding file extension (i.e. .m3u8). For example, if this value is set to 'master' (excluding ''), the actual file name will be 'master.m3u8'.

inputRankIndex.description: Input rank to switch to. Value 1 or 2.

serviceId.description: Id of the service this command applies to.

sourceId.description: Id of the source this command applies to. This source shall contain 2 inputs.

addons.description: Add-ons to a service; e.g. Logo

destinationsId.description: List of destination connected to a service

dynamicProgramMode.description: Specify the dynamic program mode of a service

id.description: Unique identifier of a service in UUID format

labels.description: Labels attached to service for identification

profileId.description: Id of profile used by a service

packagingFormat.description: Packaging format of the origin request

drmTrackFilterProperties.description: List of drm track filter properties

dpiTierSetting.description: DPI tier setting, to configure allowing incoming SCTE35 messages only from the specified list of tier values

id.description: Unique identifier of an image file

labels.description: Labels are used to specify identifying metadata

lastModified.description: Date of image last modification on remote server

operatorId.description: Operator ID provided by Irdeto (must match the one specified in the license file)

password.description: Password to use with the file server

username.description: Username to use with the file server

asiCard.description: Specify which ASI card to receive the input (value 0 for card 1, and so on).

asiPort.description: Specify which port of the ASI card to receive the input (value 0 for port 1, and so on).

automaticGrooming.description: Enable automatic grooming. Might not be supported by all input types.

grooming.description: Essential metadata for the system to intelligently route the input

pcrConstraints.description: Customize the PCR constraints for TS inputs (like IP/SRT/CLOUD). Once set, the system will use customized constraints to check the PCR values and end-to-end latency could be increased.

programNum.description: Program number of the input stream. Only required in MPTS input.

sporadicVideoFrames.description: Specify that sporadic video frames input. Video frames can come in bursts or at random intervals. Typical use case is music streams with still video content.

tsProgramNumber.description: Indicates the maximum number of programs that can be transcoded from this input.

id.description: The id of DrmFixedResource

numConsecutiveCycles.description: The number of consecutive sample periods with response latency under threshold that will actually trigger a scale-down

responseLatencyThreshold.description: The value of the server response latency (Time to first response byte) to consider a scale-down

filterMode.description: Filter Mode of DPI, pass all or drop all

handleStreamConditioning.description: Should the transcoder handle stream conditioning at splice point to prepare for destination device

frequencySpectrum.description: 22 kHz Tone. Applicable only when lnbType is UNIVERSAL or UNIVERSAL_WIDE.

oscillatorFrequency.description: Local oscillator frequency in GHz. Decimal range depends on LNB Type. For C_BAND, range from 5Ghz to 6Ghz. For KU_BAND range from 8.5Ghz to 13Ghz. Not applicable for UNIVERSAL and UNIVERSAL_WIDE.

channelId.description: Specify how to locate an audio track

channelList.description: For SMPTE302M Audio channel selection on audio stream and audio channels

delay.description: Delay in milliseconds. Minimum value is 180000 (ie 3 minutes). It shall be lower than the recording buffer size of the corresponding Loop Record service.

delayUpdate.description: Enables a scheduled update of the delay, for example for next daylight saving time transition. nextDelay and nextDelayActivationDate shall be configured.

nextDelayActivationDate.description: UTC date when the next delay will be applied. It is expressed by a string with the following format "yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss" ( ex: 2024-11-20 04:00:00 ).

recordId.description: Id of the Loop Record service that is recording the stream to play with a delay.

carrierFrequency.description: Carrier frequency. Decimal range. Minimum : 3. Maximum : 4.2. Steps : 0.000001.

plsCode.description: Physical Layer Scrambling Seed. Integer range. Minimum : 0. Maximum : 262141. Steps : 1.

polarization.description: Polarization. Possible values : VERTICAL (input #1) or HORIZONTAL (input #3).

symbolRate.description: Symbol rate. Decimal range. Minimum : 1. Maximum : 64. Steps : 0.000001.

iso639AudioType.description: Preferred audio ISO639 type. Set to null to match any type

language.description: Preferred audio track language. Expects 3 letter abbreviation based on ISO639 (e.g. ENG, FRA) and set to null to match any language

countryCode.description: Optional Country Code to append to the Language Code

defaultSubtitle.description: Whether or not the teletext stream is the stream for default subtitle

skipProcessing.description: Indicate this teletext stream will not be processed and will not be mux.

teletextHexPageNum.description: Verbatim hexadecimal page number of teletext stream - should be used if not null

teletextMagazineNumber.description: Magazine number of teletext stream in the range 1..8

teletextPageNumber.description: Obsolete decimal page number of teletext stream - does not support pages in the range [A-F]

periodSeconds.description: The time in seconds for which the policy should hold true.

type.description: Allowed change in either number of pods or percentage of current replicas.

createUser.description: The create user of the profile version

createUserEmail.description: The create user email of the profile version

note.description: The descriptive note user enter when saving a new profile version

supercede.description: The profile version which is replaced by current version

validateUser.description: The validate user of the profile version

validateUserEmail.description: The validate user email of the profile version

algorithm.description: Indicates the encryption format of edge auth

cpu.description: Number of CPU cores or units of virtual CPU

cpuLimitRatio.description: Ratio of CPU usage limit to allocated amount

mallocArenaMax.description: Number of malloc arena for C/C++ application inside container

memInMB.description: Memory in MiB, this value should include the size of cache if memory-backed cache is enabled

descriptorContent.description: Content of descriptor represented in base64 encoded string

time.description: The time information for statistic, e.g. 2015-11-04T09:11:33Z

sizeSec.description: Target size of input buffer in seconds

enabled.description: True if the sequence is enabled. A sequence enabled means that it can be inserted in the playlist manually or by a trigger

id.description: Id of the sequence

startTrigger.description: Name of the trigger that can be used to insert the sequence into the playlist

stopTrigger.description: Name of the trigger that can be used to stop a sequence
